title: [BUG] SkiaSharp version 2.88.6 has mosaics when loading images in .NET 7 and the background becomes dark.
body:
### Description

SkiaSharp version 2.88.6 has mosaics when loading images in .NET 7 and the background becomes dark.

![QQ图片20231018151428](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/assets/114386814/ffec1555-8876-4251-ae34-5182477252a6)

Tested SkiaSharp version 2.88.5 without this problem
